page.title: 02LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: I think Ripon is a nice city because it is clean and tidy and the people are very friendly especialy the old folk.It is a very pleasant place to live its nice and peaceful.In the City centre there are lots of old houses and shops and lots of back alleys,thin and winding.There aren't many shops but on Thursday there is a market and on Saturday there are fruit and vegetable stalls. There are three rivers in Ripon the Skell,Ure and Laver. Most people call Ripon a town,as it is very small to be a city in fact it is the smallest city in Great Britain. Next year in 1986 our city will celebrate its 1100th birthday.Ripon was started by an Anglian tribe called the Hyrpe folk.King Alfred gave the city a charter in 886 and so from there 1100 years later is 1986.
